segments.text: I feel a bit sad watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so distracted, like she's not really present in the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is just going unnoticed, like her thoughts are somewhere else entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're just trying to have a bit of fun, but they're being so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, but I also hope they don't get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, looking so innocent and unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sad for the woman, she seems so out of touch with what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going on in her mind, to be so distracted and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me feel a bit melancholy, like there's something deeper going on than what meets the eye.
segments.speaker: PAR
